data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sumontha, Montri, Chomngam, Nirut, Phanamphon, Eakarit, Pawangkhanant, Parinya, Viriyapanon, Chutinton, Thanaprayotsak, Wanlada, Pauwels, Olivier S. G. (2017): A new limestone-dwelling leaf-toed gecko (Gekkonidae: Dixonius) from Khao Sam Roi Yot massif, peninsular Thailand. Zootaxa 4247 (5): 556-568, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4247.5.2|2 occurrences
